Uses of Package
org.castor.ddl

Packages that use org.castor.ddl
org.castor.ddl This package contains functional classes, exceptions and Main class for DDL generator
Author: Le Duc Bao  
org.castor.ddl.engine.db2 This package contains final classes to create DDL for Db2
Author: Le Duc Bao  
org.castor.ddl.engine.derby This package contains final classes to create DDL for Derby
Author: Le Duc Bao  
org.castor.ddl.engine.hsql This package contains final classes to create DDL for Hsql
Author: Le Duc Bao  
org.castor.ddl.engine.mssql This package contains final classes to create DDL for Microsoft SQL Server
Author: Le Duc Bao  
org.castor.ddl.engine.mysql This package contains final classes to create DDL for MySQL
Author: Le Duc Bao  
org.castor.ddl.engine.oracle This package contains final classes to create DDL for Oracle
Author: Le Duc Bao  
org.castor.ddl.engine.pointbase This package contains final classes to create DDL for PointBase
Author: Le Duc Bao  
org.castor.ddl.engine.postgresql This package contains final classes to create DDL for PostgreSQL
Author: Le Duc Bao  
org.castor.ddl.engine.sapdb This package contains final classes to create DDL for SapDB
Author: Le Duc Bao  
org.castor.ddl.engine.sybase This package contains final classes to create DDL for Sybase
Author: Le Duc Bao  
org.castor.ddl.keygenerator   
org.castor.ddl.schemaobject This package contains SchemaObject for ddl creation including Table, Field, KeyGenerator, Index, Schema and KeyRepository. 
org.castor.ddl.typeinfo This package contains various types' definition. 
utf.org.castor.ddl   
utf.org.castor.ddl.db2   
utf.org.castor.ddl.derby   
 

Classes in org.castor.ddl used by org.castor.ddl
BaseConfiguration
          BaseConfiguration handles configuration's key definition.
Configuration
          Configuration handle the configuration for DDL generator inclidung load configuration files, manage configuration values
Generator
          Generator is the interface for various generators.
GeneratorException
          GeneratorException, base class for all DDL generator exception
KeyGenNotSupportException
          Key generator exception
KeyNotFoundException
          Configuration Key does not find exception
MappingHelper
          This class handles all common tasks for manipulating Mapping document
TypeMapper
          Interface associates JDBC type to TypeInfo.
WrongFormatException
          Wrong format exception
 

Classes in org.castor.ddl used by org.castor.ddl.engine.db2
AbstractGenerator
          AbstractGenerator is the base class for various DDL generator of specific DB and handles following tasks:
  • Extract information from Mapping to Schema
  • Loop through the schema and provide a skeleton for DDL creation

    AbstractGenerator will automatically extract necessary information for DDL creation.

    		•
    AbstractTypeMapper
              AbstractTypeMapper is the base class for mapping JDBC supported type and RDBMS data type.
    Configuration
              Configuration handle the configuration for DDL generator inclidung load configuration files, manage configuration values
    Generator
              Generator is the interface for various generators.
    GeneratorException
              GeneratorException, base class for all DDL generator exception
    TypeMapper
              Interface associates JDBC type to TypeInfo.
